UData\Configuration

This classes properties are all set and retireved by magic method. You can initialize the class with an indexed array that can be retrieved via magic method.

Implements

UData\Options

Functions

public function __construct (
Array $opts = null
)
Parameters
array $opts

Is an optional indexed array of configuration options to intialize the object with
